actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 (82 Stat. 906) by designating a portion of the Shavers Fork of the Cheat River, EW., Va., for study as a potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Designates a portion of the Shavers Fork of the Cheat River, West Virginia, for study as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 (82 Stat. 906) by designating a portion of the Shavers Fork of the Cheat River, EW., Va., for study as a potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system.
